item.description:
The September meetup turned out to be a very informal round-table discussion and I think we'll go for the same for October. Bring yourself, your thoughts, and your appetite and join us for our lunch-hour meetup to talk about any web development topic that is on your mind.

This is a lunch-hour meeting so bring your appetite - you can buy lunch or brown-bag it. Hope to see you there!

group.name: Providence Web Development Lunch Hour Meetup Group

item.name: Providence Web Development Lunch Hour October Meetup
